text: Great school and fantastic exposure! Location is perfect and the course is extremely relevant and updated. Loved my time here and the student population is multicultural too!
I had the best time during my LLM in Singapore. The campus is very modern. The lectures are on a high-level and combine theory and practical legal matters perfectly.
Yesterday had my last exam at Sorbonne Assas International in Singapore. Was doing my LL.M. Program. Loved it, highly recommend üëçüèº
Wonderful experience with a strong cohort of international students to sharing and exchanging global perspectives. Makes class discussion so much more interesting and insightful.
